Summary: Light came towards then turned to my left as going away and disappeared.
divs: Sighting DetailsThought was plane at first but different color light and very slow moving. We do have a blimp in town for a golf tournament but only 1 solid light and then it faded out. No idea what it was, just caught my eye when closing window.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Hilliard
There were no other sightings in Hilliard on or around May 26th 2013
